Features

Everything You Need to Go Paperless

Powerful features designed for simplicity

Smart Document Scanning

Capture documents instantly with automatic edge detection and image enhancement. Scans complete in under 30 seconds.

Cloud Backup & Sync

Securely backup to iCloud or Google Drive. Access your documents across all your devices, anywhere in the world.

Effortless Organization

Organize documents into folders with smart auto-naming. Find any document in under 10 seconds.

Bank-Level Security

Your documents are encrypted and stored securely. Sign in with Apple or Google for seamless authentication.

Instant Sharing

Share documents via email or your favorite apps with a single tap. Maintain original quality every time.

Works Offline

Access your recently viewed documents without an internet connection. Sync happens automatically when you're back online.

How It Works

Get Started in Minutes

Three simple steps to digital document freedom

1

Scan or Upload

Use your camera to capture documents or upload existing photos and PDFs from your device.

2

Organize Automatically

Documents are enhanced, named with dates, and sorted into folders. Zero effort required.

3

Access Anywhere

Enable cloud sync and access your documents from any device, anytime.

Download DigitalKeep free today and take control of your documents.
